ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, if 「総天然色祭」 is in the Climax slot, during this turn, this card gets +X Power, gains Yellow, Green and Red. X is equals to the number of your 《探偵》 Characters x500.

name: 根っこは素直 ネロ
expansion: Milky Holmes the Movie -Milky Holmes Counterattack-
flavor_text: 何だよ、もう、傷つくなぁ
ability: 【C】 EXPERIENCE If the total Level of cards in your Level slot is 4 or higher, this card gets +1000 Power.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand or through 『CHANGE』, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.
【A】 When this card attacks, if 「荒らされた農園」 is in the Climax slot, all your Characters, during this turn, it gets +3000 Power.

name: 偵都の少女 エリー
expansion: Milky Holmes the Movie -Milky Holmes Counterattack-
flavor_text: あの、私も…
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose 1 of your 《探偵》 Characters, during this turn, it gets +1 Level, +1000 Power.

name: けなげでひたむき シャロ
expansion: Milky Holmes the Movie -Milky Holmes Counterattack-
flavor_text: あたしたちは探偵です！
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.

【A】［①］ When this card attacks, if 「サイコキネシス」 is in the Climax slot, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose up to 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand, all your 《探偵》 Characters, during this turn, get +2000 Power.

name: 謎に詰め寄るコーデリア
expansion: Milky Holmes the Movie -Milky Holmes Counterattack-
flavor_text: 逃げてどうなるっていうの！
ability: 【A】 When you use this card's 『ASSIST』, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《探偵》 Character, choose 1 of your Character, during this turn, it gets +1000 Power.（Return revealed card to its original position）
【S】● ASSIST 1500 Level 1 ［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during that turn, it gets +1500 Power)

name: “それが探偵”ミルキィホームズ
expansion: Milky Holmes the Movie -Milky Holmes Counterattack-
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《探偵》 Character, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +1500 Power.（Return revealed card to its original position）
